title: what happens if my other account got hacked?

replies.body:
Hey there,

if you can't access your email and your accounts login details have been compromised then you'll have to submit a ticket for account recovery.

>[Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154) with the subject line "Unrecoverable Account" from the email address that you used to sign up for your account. Make sure to provide us with the requested information about the account you are trying to recover. From there we will work with you to verify ownership of the account.
